duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise nursing staff assigned to a particular shift, assigning patients and educating nursing staff on patient care.
Assess, monitor, and educate the nursing staff on patient care, and institute emergency procedures as necessary.
Anticipate staffing needs and oversee stocking of supplies and updating patient records.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree in Nursing and California RN license, minimum of two (2) years clinical experience as a registered nurse in an acute care psych unit, and BLS from an AHA accredited training center
